https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sUu7wOOij36fEhExPjcnz0mhNEg.jpg Aimlessly cruising through his first post-Stanford University summer, 22 year old David Braddock finds himself in China where he meets Mei, an ambitious young girl who urges him to find his life's direction. An American in China
